title: Authors and Citation
text: Saldanha R (2024). zenstats: Statistics 'Zenodo' Deposits. R package version 0.0.3, https://rfsaldanha.github.io/zenstats/.
code: @Manual{,   title = {zenstats: Statistics from 'Zenodo' Deposits},   author = {Raphael Saldanha},   year = {2024},   note = {R package version 0.0.3},   url = {https://rfsaldanha.github.io/zenstats/}, }

title: Statistics from Zenodo Deposits
text: can install development version zenstats GitHub :

title: Statistics from Zenodo Deposits
code: library(zenstats)  ids <- c(10036212, 10947952)  deposit_stats(ids, all_versions_only = TRUE, progress = FALSE) #> # A tibble: 2 × 5 #>   date                 deposit views downloads  volume #>   <dttm>                 <dbl> <dbl>     <dbl>   <byt> #> 1 2024-05-02 16:42:17 10036212   493       306 1.40 TB #> 2 2024-05-02 16:42:17 10947952    54        35 1.50 GB

what: Fetch stats from one or more Zenodo deposits — deposit_stats
title: Fetch stats from one or more Zenodo deposits — deposit_stats
Fetch stats from one or more Zenodo deposits — deposit_stats
Fetch stats from one or more Zenodo deposits — deposit_stats
text: deposit_ids vector. vector Zenodo deposit ids. all_versions_only logical. TRUE, return results versions. progress logical. Show progress bar.

text: deposit_id numeric. Zenodo deposit id. all_versions_only logical. TRUE, return results versions.

title: Scrap statistics from a Zenodo deposit — scrap_stats
Scrap statistics from a Zenodo deposit — scrap_stats
code: scrap_stats(10013255) #> # A tibble: 2 × 6 #>   date                 deposit version      views downloads   volume #>   <dttm>                 <dbl> <chr>        <dbl>     <dbl>    <byt> #> 1 2024-05-17 10:31:05 10013255 All versions   151       230 21.40 GB #> 2 2024-05-17 10:31:05 10013255 This version   151       230 21.40 GB

title: zenstats 0.0.3
text: Check Internet connection Zenodo deposit URL. Internal tests check function’s integrity.
